After same-sex blessing ruling, pope decries inflexible ideologiesPope Francis on Thursday warned against inflexible ideological positions that can hinder the Church from seeing reality and moving forward, speaking days after a declaration allowing blessings of same-sex couples that conservatives have condemned. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 10:26:43 GMT OUW3TZTSYZJNRBSQNVTRQCBTB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/after-same-sex-blessing-ruling-pope-decries-inflexible-ideologies-2023-12-21/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
EU top court rules Polish court chamber is not a tribunal under EU lawThe European Union's top court said on Thursday that Poland's Chamber of Extraordinary Control and Public Affairs of the Supreme Court was not an independent tribunal under EU law. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 10:13:12 GMT SAWGKSYGERO63F5G74YY2YS22Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-top-court-rules-polish-court-chamber-is-not-tribunal-under-eu-law-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Vietnam police arrest deputy trade minister in bribery probePolice in Vietnam have arrested Deputy Minister of Industry and Trade Do Thang Hai on an accusation of bribery, the country's security ministry said on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 09:59:12 GMT 3OVV4372OJP7PPTSRCONCBLQAM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-police-arrest-deputy-trade-minister-bribery-probe-2023-12-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Israeli strike kills elderly woman in southern Lebanon - state news agencyAn Israeli strike killed an elderly woman and wounded her husband in their home in southern Lebanon early on Thursday, Lebanon's state news agency and a security source said. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 09:28:51 GMT BGWJQMCLHFPJNAVJC5QK2UJVAA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-strike-kills-woman-southern-lebanon-state-news-agency-2023-12-21/Reuters世界中东
Thailand edges closer to legalising same-sex marriageThe Thai parliament is set to begin deliberating four draft bills on same-sex marriage, moving the country closer towards its legalisation with the first vote on the bills expected later on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 09:16:55 GMT NS72B3OLMZKDBNRJXKSFGNNCP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-edges-closer-legalising-same-sex-marriage-2023-12-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Myanmar junta accused of war crimes over response to rebel offensiveMyanmar's military has likely perpetrated indiscriminate attacks on civilians and used banned cluster munitions in its fight against ethnic minority insurgents, Amnesty International said on Thursday, calling for an investigation of suspected war crimes. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 09:15:12 GMT SWRZ3RIVLBJ2XEAJACKVRE7RD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-junta-accused-war-crimes-over-response-rebel-offective-2023-12-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Northern Gaza no longer has a functional hospital, WHO saysThe World Health Organization said on Thursday that northern Gaza has been left without a functional hospital due to a lack of fuel, staff and supplies. Polish president denounces Tusk's state media overhaul as 'anarchy'The new Polish government led by Donald Tusk is implementing reforms of state media that amount to "anarchy", the president said on Thursday, amid rising tensions between the head of state and a new pro-European Union administration. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 08:36:33 GMT EJODUDDNJL5K35BN6DM3Z4HRWFU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-president-denounces-tusks-state-media-overhaul-anarchy-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Congo votes in extended, chaotic election as opposition seeks rerunThe Democratic Republic of Congo voted on Thursday on the second day of a chaotic and in parts violent general election after authorities extended opening hours for polling stations that failed to open the previous day. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 08:21:02 GMT 6RTHLP7IDJPKRD3INAKLXRY5OM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-votes-extended-election-opposition-calls-rerun-2023-12-21/Ange Kasongo, Christophe Perre世界非洲
Urban school farm opens world of opportunity to British teensThe rural life of rearing rare breed sheep and nurturing alpacas is a world away for many urban teenagers. Yet a British school near Liverpool has opened its pupils to a wealth of jobs in agriculture and the benefits of nature with its own farm. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 08:18:45 GMT ESM6KFEGQRKIFCHDOTTTVOIZ7M https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/urban-school-farm-opens-world-opportunity-british-teens-2023-12-21/Phil Noble, Andy Bruce世界英国
China-Philippines relations: Major events in South China Sea disputeRelations between Manila and Beijing have soured under Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, with Manila pivoting back towards the United States which supports the Southeast Asian nation in its maritime disputes with China.
